Blood 3

Leeching Touch
Combat
B1
spell id [id]: 1066
effect number [effect_number]: 103
damage [damage]: 1014
spec [spec]: 545259648
range [rng_bat]: 1
casting time [casttime]: 50%
area of effect [aoe_s]: One person
number of effects [nreff]: 1
fatigue cost [fatiguecost]: 20-
Drain Life:15+
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], May Use Underwater [uwok], No effect on Inanimate [inanimateimmune])
The mage tries to touch a target and will drain some of the target's life force if successful. The life force drained will be used to heal and reinvigorate the mage.
